markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lead the Way](/Feats.aspx?ID=3582) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 75

**Archetype** [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092)

</column>

---

You move forward, creating an opening for others to follow. Choose one adjacent ally who has a reaction available. You Stride, and that ally can use their reaction to immediately Stride. The ally must end their Stride adjacent to you. If the ally Strides in this way, they don't trigger reactions that are normally triggered by movement. You, however, still trigger those reactions normally.
name: Lead the Way

summary_markdown: You move forward, creating an opening for others to follow.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 10" pfs="Standard" > Lead the Way Two Actions Source Knights of Lastwall pg. 75 Archetype Knight Vigilant Prerequisites Knight Vigilant --- You move forward, creating an opening for others to follow. Choose one adjacent ally who has a reaction available. You Stride, and that ally can use their reaction to immediately Stride. The ally must end their Stride adjacent to you. If the ally Strides in this way, they don't trigger reactions that are normally triggered by movement. You, however, still trigger those reactions normally.
